name: Lowpoly stylized Asian pack
description:
Hi!  These assets were an unfinished project unfortunately :( . It is inspired by Asian aesthetics. This is a package with more than 100 models for game development. All models share a single material with a color palette that allows you to create nice environments for topdown, arena or first person games. 

For now, it will only be updated to fix some bugs that may appear, but if it has good acceptance, it will be updated with more than 100 new models.

This file can be use for any propose, commercial or not, just can't be resold.
